jobDescription: Perform cell culture as well as in vitro transporter substrate phenotyping and inhibition assays in recombinant cell lines and primary hepatocytes. -Analyze and interpret data, write reportsMinimum of BS degree or equivalent - Experience with cell based assays and cell culture - Familiarity with data handling/graphing software (e.g. Excel, Graphpad Prism) - Dexterity in handling automation equipment - Excellent communication skills (both oral and written) - Strong commitment to work in a team environment
